Posts.Content: sumomo wrote: Hi. I finished chemo in April this year so it's been about seven months. I just found from my recent bloodwork that my white blood cell count was still very low, even lower than when I was tested three months ago. According to the info available, it seems the recovery takes a few months to six months at most, so mine seems to be a unusually slow case. Has anyone experienced the same? Log in to post a reply
